| Property             | Attribute    | Description               | Type               | Default     |
| -------------------- | ------------ | ------------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- |

| `value` _(required)_ | `value`      | Currently active tab      | `number \| string` | `undefined` |

| ------------- | -------------------------- | ------------------ |
